title: Buffett Questions Private Equity, Technology Disruption ‘Pivot’, Trump’s New Trade Threat
itunes:title: Buffett Questions Private Equity, Technology Disruption ‘Pivot’, Trump’s New Trade Threat
description:
Sonali Basak, Bloomberg News Investment Banking Reporter, discusses Warren Buffett joining the chorus criticizing private equity firms for gaming returns. Larry Downes, Senior Fellow at Accenture Research, talks about his book “Pivot to the Future” about discovering value and creating growth in a disrupted world. Andy Browne, Editorial Director of Bloomberg New Economy, breaks down the global impact of President Trump threatening to raise tariffs on Chinese goods. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Consumer Reporter Tiffany Kary talk about female innovators starting consumer-product businesses for women. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.  Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
